formDescription: Step 3 - Technical Information - Surface Water Source

NameOfSource.title: Name of source:
NameOfSource.description: The name of the source of surface water

NameUnknown.title: Name unknown
NameUnknown.description: Whether the name of the source of surface water is unknown

DescribeWaterSource.title: Describe the characteristics of source (source of water, seasonal or year round, quantity or estimate of flow, etc.):
DescribeWaterSource.description: The characteristics of the source of surface water

SourceFlowsInto.title: Source flows into:
SourceFlowsInto.description: The body of water the source flows into

DescribeDiversionPointLocation.title: Describe the location of the proposed point of diversion or storage on stream:
DescribeDiversionPointLocation.description: A description of the diversion point

LandmarkReferences.title: Landmark references:
LandmarkReferences.description: How this body of water is related to nearby landmarks

EstimatedWidthOfSourceAtDivers.title: Estimated width of source at diversion point:
EstimatedWidthOfSourceAtDivers.description: The estimated width of the source in metres at the diversion point

EstimatedDepthOfSourceAtDivers.title: Estimated depth of source at diversion point:
EstimatedDepthOfSourceAtDivers.description: The estimated depth of the source in metres at the diversion point
